string-array.name: jokeList
string-array.item: A small boy swallowed some coins and was taken to a hospital. When his grandmother telephoned to ask how he was a nurse said, \'No change yet\'.
Cartoonist found dead in home. Details are sketchy.
I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.

resources.string: I am just curious what legendary other mesmers have gone for. I go back and forth all the time lol. I want to make one because it is something to do.. but I switch my weapons and play style all the time so I canâ€™t decide :P
